definition: (used as a combining form) relating to--of or by or to or from or for--the self, your consciousness of your own identity
details:
adjective
- (used as a combining form) relating to--of or by or to or from or for--the self
= example: (used as a combining form) relating to--of or by or to or from or for--the self
noun
- your consciousness of your own identity
= synonyms: ego
- a person considered as a unique individual
= example: a person considered as a unique individual
